title: LibreOffice 7.6 Officially Released: This Is What’s New
description:
Highlights of LibreOffice 7.6 include support for zoom gestures on touchpads in the main view, support for document themes, and more.

The post LibreOffice 7.6 Officially Released: This Is What’s New appeared first on Linux Today.

title: UbuntuDDE Remix 23.04 Released: Here’s What’s New
description:
In the UbuntuDDE Remix 23.04, Ubuntu’s reliability meets Deepin’s modern interface for a pleasant computing experience.

The post UbuntuDDE Remix 23.04 Released: Here’s What’s New appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Budgie Desktop 10.8 Released: Here’s What’s New
description:
Budgie 10.8 uses a new window manager and comes with menu enhancements, system tray improvements, and minor advancements across the entire desktop.

The post Budgie Desktop 10.8 Released: Here’s What’s New appeared first on Linux Today.

title: StarLite 5 Is a Linux Tablet Powered by Intel Alder Lake N200
description:
StarLite 5, a Linux-powered tablet with a 12.5-inch screen and Intel N200 CPU, is now available for pre-order. The price starts at $498.

The post StarLite 5 Is a Linux Tablet Powered by Intel Alder Lake N200 appeared first on Linux Today.

title: GNOME 45 Beta Released: Here’s What’s New
description:
The GNOME 45 beta introduces improvements for the GNOME Control Center (Settings) app along with various memory leak and accessibility label fixes.

The post GNOME 45 Beta Released: Here’s What’s New appeared first on Linux Today.
